topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545823586368721d61f10000#post_545823586368721d61f10000
What I'm excited about; I know it's getting into politics, but right now social conservatism is dying hard.

I've talked about it a couple times so I'll just summarize: Republicans are going to take control of congress, but the reason why is because they're dropping social conservatism(you know; like the anti-glbt platforms and all that).

The reason why this is important is that the religious right, social conservatives and such are losing power in the usa meaning that while yes republicans are going to be around ten years from now the reason why they'll still exist is because social conservatism is literally dying(the vast majority of extremist social conservatives are old and looking at dying in the next fifteen years due to old age) so they're dropping it.

Summary if you're confused what this means:
Social conservatism is now unpopular -> Republicans are starting to drop it cause in order to win elections they have to drop it -> bye bye social conservatives -> five years from now societally throughout the usa glbt *AND* crossdressing will in all probability be accepted by the majority as acceptable.

Tl:dr; chances are crossdressing and such is going to be acceptable in the next few years.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5458260a63687224f2ef0100#post_5458260a63687224f2ef0100
I told my friend this and he literally did a backflip even though he's republican cause basically the current republican party is pretty much the tea party under the name republican; there's a massive difference between old school republicans and tea party.  Like a lot of old school republicans are salty that they have had no say in ages and while chances are they're not going to win in 2016 at least the tea party is getting thrown out finally.


Tl:dr;
Super liberals that don't understand long term politics, "NO!"
Old school democrats, "fucking finally the nutters are losing power"
Glenn Beck style tea party members, "*NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!*"
Old school republicans:
!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/276/988/f42.gif!


If you're still not getting what I mean basically Eisenhower style republicans are taking back the republican party.

topics.body:
Okay here's a major plot hole in Psyren.
[spoiler]The whole point of the Psyren game is to change future. But one of the rules is you can't tell anyone that's isn't involved with the game ABOUT the future. That doesn't make any sense. How is someone supposed to change the future if you aren't allowed to explain to ANYONE what goes wrong?[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
